import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib as mpl
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib.patches as mpatches
import matplotlib.gridspec as gridspec
import seaborn as sns


import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings(action='ignore')
plt.rcParams['figure.dpi'] = 200 #high resolution
source.ac3619b7: print('The dataset has {} rows and {} columns.'.format(len(data), len(data.columns)))
source.53447087:
age_q1 = data['Q1'].value_counts()

plt.figure(figsize=(8,2))
sns.barplot(age_q1.index, age_q1.values, alpha=0.5)
plt.ylabel('Number of Q1', fontsize=5)
plt.xlabel('The total age count', fontsize=5)
plt.title('Maximun age count where kaggle is used most')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

# Data to plot for male or female

plt.ylabel('Question Number Q2', fontsize=5)
plt.xlabel('The Gender count', fontsize=5)
plt.title('Type of gender maximum the kaggle are used')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

plt.xlabel('Top 10 Countries around the using Kaggle the most', fontsize=5)
plt.title('Top 10 country used the kaggle the most around the world')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.show()

source.80bbfe02:
Argentina = d[d['Q3'] == 'Argentina']

fig, ax = plt.subplots(2, 2, figsize=(30, 15))

sns.barplot(Argentina['Q2'].index, Argentina['Q2'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[0,0])
ax[0,0].set_title('Gender count in Argentina')

sns.countplot(Argentina['Q4'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,1])
ax[1,1].set_title('Education of all the kagglers in Argentina')
plt.setp( ax[1,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

sns.countplot(Argentina['Q5'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,0])
ax[1,0].set_title('Position of all the kagglers in Argentina')
plt.setp( ax[1,0].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )


sns.countplot(Argentina['Q6'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[0,1])
ax[0,1].set_title('Age group of all the kagglers in Argentina')
plt.setp( ax[0,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

fig.suptitle('Over all view of Argentina')

sns.barplot(Israel['Q2'].index, Israel['Q2'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[0,0])
ax[0,0].set_title('Gender count in Israel')

sns.countplot(Israel['Q4'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,1])
ax[1,1].set_title('Education of all the kagglers in Israel')
plt.setp( ax[1,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

sns.countplot(Israel['Q5'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,0])
ax[1,0].set_title('Position of all the kagglers in Israel')
plt.setp( ax[1,0].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )


sns.countplot(Israel['Q6'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[0,1])
ax[0,1].set_title('Age group of all the kagglers in Israel')
plt.setp( ax[0,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

fig.suptitle('Over all view of Israel')

ax[0,0].set_title('Gender count in Spain')

sns.countplot(Spain['Q4'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,1])
ax[1,1].set_title('Education of all the kagglers in Spain')
plt.setp( ax[1,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

sns.countplot(Spain['Q5'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[1,0])
ax[1,0].set_title('Position of all the kagglers in Spain')
plt.setp( ax[1,0].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )


sns.countplot(Spain['Q6'].values, alpha=0.5, ax=ax[0,1])
ax[0,1].set_title('Age group of all the kagglers in Spain')
plt.setp( ax[0,1].xaxis.get_majorticklabels(), rotation=70 )

fig.suptitle('Over all view of Spain')
